item.description:
Hope to see as many of you as possible on Tuesday, March 15th at 7 PM.  Now that the planes are flying to New England from Phoenix and most of the snow has melted in Reading perhaps it will be easier for us to meet!

Come with your concerns and questions, helpful information and positive attitudes!  I will bring my laser for those of you who want to experience it.  I had a list of five people last month who wanted to try it but I had to cancel my meeting due to the weather.  If we don't have time that evening you can schedule a free mini-session with me during the week.

Don't forget donations are always welcome to cover the meeting costs. 

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs. There is an elevator on the right as you come in on the first level
item.why: Heads up, our next meeting is on Tuesday, March 15th, 2011. I sent out a message to this effect a while back but it appears no one received it.
item.name: Reading Fibromyalgia Support Group Meetup
